fields.description: We currently use a outdated version of acorn to parse JavaScript files in Hyperloop. As the node-titnaium-sdk recently moved to Babylon for better support of upcoming ES version, we should also make that change in Hyperloop.
fields.summary: Hyperloop: iOS - Move to Babylon for JavaScript parsing
